statements: SELECT * FROM weather_forecast WHERE location_name = 'New York';
SELECT location_name, current_condition, temperature FROM weather_forecast WHERE prediction_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT location_name, humidity, wind_speed FROM weather_forecast ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_forecast WHERE current_condition = 'Sunny' AND humidity > 70;
SELECT location_name, temperature, wind_speed FROM weather_forecast WHERE wind_speed BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM weather_forecast WHERE location_name = 'New York' AND temperature > 80
SELECT location_name, current_condition, temperature FROM weather_forecast WHERE humidity < 60 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT location_name, humidity FROM weather_forecast WHERE wind_speed > 15 ORDER BY prediction_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_forecasts FROM weather_forecast WHERE prediction_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT location_name, current_condition, temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM weather_forecast WHERE prediction_date >= '2022-06-01'
SELECT * FROM location_weather;
SELECT location_name, current_condition, current_temperature FROM location_weather WHERE current_temperature > 25;
SELECT location_name, forecast, forecasted_condition FROM location_weather WHERE forecast > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM map_data ORDER BY map_zoom_level DESC;
SELECT location_name, forecasted_temperature FROM location_weather WHERE forecasted_temperature < 20;
SELECT * FROM location_weather ORDER BY current_temperature DESC, location_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_name, current_condition, forecasted_condition FROM location_weather WHERE forecast > '2022-01-01' AND current_condition = 'Sunny';
SELECT location_name, forecasted_temperature FROM location_weather WHERE forecasted_temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY forecasted_temperature DESC;
SELECT lw.location_name, md.map_image_url FROM location_weather lw INNER JOIN map_data md ON lw.id = md.location_id WHERE lw.current_condition LIKE '%Rain%' ORDER BY lw.location_name ASC;

SELECT lw.location_name, lw.current_condition, md.map_coordinates FROM location_weather lw INNER JOIN map_data md ON lw.id = md.location_id WHERE md.map_zoom_level > 5 ORDER BY lw.location_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM weather_forecast;
SELECT location_name, temperature, humidity FROM weather_forecast ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT location_name, current_condition FROM weather_forecast WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT prediction_date, temperature_predicted, humidity_predicted FROM predictions WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM map_locations;
SELECT * FROM weather_forecast ORDER BY location_name DESC, temperature ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_name, current_condition FROM weather_forecast WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY temperature DESC;

SELECT location_name, temperature, humidity FROM weather_forecast INNER JOIN map_locations ON weather_forecast.location_id = map_locations.location_id WHERE latitude < 40 OR longitude > -100 ORDER BY location_name;
SELECT prediction_date, temperature_predicted, humidity_predicted FROM predictions WHERE temperature_predicted BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity_predicted > 60 ORDER BY prediction_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT location_name, temperature, prediction_date FROM weather_forecast INNER JOIN predictions ON weather_forecast.location_id = predictions.location_id WHERE temperature > temperature_predicted ORDER BY prediction_date, temperature DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT condition, temperature, humidity FROM weather_conditions WHERE temperature > 20;
SELECT forecast_description, high_temperature, low_temperature FROM forecasts WHERE forecast_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT map_name, map_image FROM maps WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC, latitude ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT forecast_date, forecast_description, high_temperature, low_temperature FROM forecasts WHERE high_temperature > 80;
SELECT condition, temperature, humidity FROM weather_conditions WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY condition ASC;
SELECT map_name, map_image FROM maps WHERE map_name LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY map_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM forecast_locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM forecast_locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT location_id, temperature, humidity FROM current_conditions WHERE humidity < 70;
SELECT prediction_date, max_temperature, precipitation FROM weather_predictions WHERE max_temperature > 25;
SELECT layer_name, layer_description FROM map_layers;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM forecast_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT temperature, humidity, wind_speed, weather_description FROM current_conditions WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity > 70;
SELECT * FROM forecast_locations WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT location_name, max_temperature, min_temperature FROM forecast_locations JOIN weather_predictions ON forecast_locations.location_id = weather_predictions.location_id;
SELECT map_name, layer_name, layer_description FROM maps JOIN map_layers ON maps.layer_id = map_layers.layer_id;
